mapper.insert:
insert into cc_float_exchange (id, exchange_id, name, slug, num_market_pairs, b_volume_24h, q_volume_24h, last_updated, create_date, update_date) values
((SELECT REPLACE(UUID(), '-', '') AS id), #{item.exchangeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.slug,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.numMarketPairs,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.bVolume24h,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{item.qVolume24h,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{item.lastUpdated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
